mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.board_id, c.user_nick, c.score, c.review, c.comment_created_at, c.comment_updated_at, p.user_uuid FROM comment c JOIN user u ON c.user_nick = u.user_nick LEFT JOIN profile p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE c.board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (board_id, user_nick, score, review) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{userNick}, #{score}, #{review});
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET score = #{score}, review = #{review}, comment_updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE comment_id = #{commentId};
